export namespace Auth {
  export const PGSchemaName = 'auth';

  export namespace Tables {
    /** Primary table for authenticated users. */
    export namespace Users {
      export const PGTableName = 'users';
    
      export type ColumnNames = |
        'user_id' |
        'email' |
        'status' |
        'roles' |
        'login_history' |
        'created_at';
    
      export interface RowType {
        /** Unique identifier for the user. */
        ['user_id']: bigint;
        /** Email address used for authentication and communication. */
        ['email']: string;
        /** Current account status. */
        ['status']: Common.Enums.UserStatus;
        /** Assigned authorization roles. */
        ['roles']: string[];
        /** Grouped login timestamps per session. */
        ['login_history']: Date[][] | null;
        /** Account creation timestamp. */
        ['created_at']: Date;
      }
    }
  }

  export namespace Functions {
    export namespace GetUserByEmail {
      export const PGFunctionName = 'get_user_by_email';
    
      export type Overloads = [
        {
          ParameterTypes: [
            string
          ],
          ReturnType: string | null
        },
        {
          ParameterTypes: [
            string,
            boolean | undefined
          ],
          ReturnType: string | null
        }
      ];
    }
    
    export namespace SetUserStatus {
      export const PGFunctionName = 'set_user_status';
    
      export type Overloads = [
        {
          ParameterTypes: [
            bigint,
            Common.Enums.UserStatus
          ],
          ReturnType: void
        }
      ];
    }
  }
}

export namespace Common {
  export const PGSchemaName = 'common';

  export namespace Enums {
    /** Enumeration representing order lifecycle states. */
    export type OrderStatus = |
      'pending' |
      'processing' |
      'completed' |
      'cancelled';
    
    /** Possible states that a user account may be in. */
    export type UserStatus = |
      'active' |
      'inactive' |
      'suspended';
  }
}

export namespace Reporting {
  export const PGSchemaName = 'reporting';

  export namespace Tables {
    export namespace Config {
      export const PGTableName = 'config';
    
      export type ColumnNames = |
        'config_key' |
        'config_value' |
        'flags';
    
      export interface RowType {
        /** Unique configuration key. */
        ['config_key']: string;
        /** Associated configuration value. */
        ['config_value']: string;
        ['flags']: string[] | null;
      }
    }
  }

  export namespace Views {
    /** Read-only per-user order summary for reporting and analytics. */
    export namespace UserOrderSummary {
      export const PGViewName = 'user_order_summary';
    
      export type ColumnNames = |
        'user_id' |
        'email' |
        'order_count' |
        'first_order_at' |
        'last_order_at';
    
      export interface RowType {
        /** User identifier. */
        ['user_id']: bigint | null;
        /** User email address. */
        ['email']: string | null;
        /** Total number of orders placed by the user. */
        ['order_count']: bigint | null;
        /** Timestamp of the user's first order. */
        ['first_order_at']: Date | null;
        /** Timestamp of the user's most recent order. */
        ['last_order_at']: Date | null;
      }
    }
  }

  export namespace MaterializedViews {
    /** Aggregated order counts by status. */
    export namespace OrderStatusCounts {
      export const PGMaterializedViewName = 'order_status_counts';
    
      export type ColumnNames = |
        'status' |
        'total_orders';
    
      export interface RowType {
        /** Order status value. */
        ['status']: Common.Enums.OrderStatus | null;
        /** Number of orders in this status. */
        ['total_orders']: bigint | null;
      }
    }
  }

  export namespace Functions {
    export namespace CountOrdersForUser {
      export const PGFunctionName = 'count_orders_for_user';

export namespace Sales {
  export const PGSchemaName = 'sales';

  export namespace Tables {
    /** Archived order item records. */
    export namespace OrderItems$Archive {
      export const PGTableName = 'order-items$archive';
    
      export type ColumnNames = |
        'item_id' |
        'order_id' |
        'sku' |
        'quantities';
    
      export interface RowType {
        /** Primary key of the archived item. */
        ['item_id']: bigint;
        /** Associated order identifier. */
        ['order_id']: bigint;
        /** Stock keeping unit code. */
        ['sku']: string;
        /** Captured quantities at archive time. */
        ['quantities']: number[];
      }
    }
    
    /** Represents an order placed by a user. */
    export namespace Orders {
      export const PGTableName = 'orders';
    
      export type ColumnNames = |
        'order_id' |
        'user_id' |
        'status' |
        'tags' |
        'totals' |
        'created_at';
    
      export interface RowType {
        /** Primary identifier for the order. */
        ['order_id']: bigint;
        /** User that placed the order. */
        ['user_id']: bigint;
        /** Current processing status. */
        ['status']: Common.Enums.OrderStatus;
        /** Optional classification tags. */
        ['tags']: string[] | null;
        /** Multi-dimensional numeric totals. */
        ['totals']: string[][] | null;
        /** Timestamp when the order was created. */
        ['created_at']: Date;
      }
    }
  }
